data.description: Contemporary G+2 3BHK villa with servant's quarters and central courtyard. Designed for a family of four on a tight budget, built on a 30x40 feet plot ensuring adherence to local building norms and Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Entrance hall with ample natural light and minimalistic decor. Serves as a transitional space from exterior to interior.
Spacious living room centered around the courtyard view for Vastu alignment. Equipped with multi-functional furniture and energy-efficient design.
Dining area adjacent to living space, designed for family gatherings; uses natural lighting and ventilation.
Compact yet efficient kitchen with modular cabinetry and integrated appliances. Uses Vastu principles for placement relative to the courtyard.
Separate servant's quarters including a small living area and storage space, ensuring privacy and compliance with local norms.
Efficient bathroom for common use; designed with water conservation fixtures.

openings.details: Main entry door with wide clearance and secure design
Large windows oriented to maximize morning sunlight as per Vastu
Lateral window placement for optimal air flow

rooms.description: Primary bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Placed in the auspicious north-east direction as per Vastu.
Secondary bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, adhering to family space requirements.
Additional bedroom, ideal for children or guest occupancy. Includes built-in storage.
Shared bathroom with water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly design
Multi-purpose room that can serve as a study or guest bedroom. Flexible space with minimalistic design.

openings.details: Skylight for natural light, designed to maximize energy efficiency

budget_considerations.energy_savings: passive solar design and natural ventilation
